page.title: 16Occupations
page.content:
The area in which our squares are situated has lost recently lost its assisted area status but the local government authorities are eager to reverse the trend of rural depopulat- ion and havereceived considerable financial help and encouragement from the Mid Wales Development Board. The breakdown of occupations for our area follows: Farming and Forestry - 20% Manufacturing Ind - 5% Services - 61% Unemployment - 14%
Above all the aim is to encourage young people to settle in the area to counter the effects of an ageing population.
